Author: victorserrano
Title: [Pre-ANN] Bitone Network: Operable New Economy
Body: https://i.imgur.com/a6xuCg4.png  WEB | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | YOUTUBE  https://i.imgur.com/pv2PVNZ.jpg   What is Bitone Network?   Bitone Network is a platform with its own chain of blocks that connects multiple chains to the Bitcoin network. It consists of a wallet compatible with various cryptoactives, which acts as a decentralized exchange house (DEX) and allows the execution of intelligent contracts from other platforms using bitcoin.  The official token of the platform is the bitone node, which allows its owner to participate in the process of verification of transactions and operations of the network through a consensus system called proof of stake (PoS), and in this way generate incentives from the commissions that users pay when using the application.   What are the advantages?   The current problem is that digital assets are isolated in their respective chains. Therefore, the goal of Bitone Network is to connect Bitcoin with all of them and in this way help it to become a more functional reference currency.  It is necessary that all this infrastructure based on a decentralized economy, possess a currency or a reference system, which acts aas a store of value and allows people around the world to save their money while using the applications offered by other blockchain platforms.  Bitone Network is a decentralized intermediary platform that allows the user to operate with intelligent contracts, decentralized applications (dapp) and anonymous transactions of other chains using bitcoin. In addition, it works with a multi-wallet (Bitone wallet), which allows to store tokens of different blockchain while using its own decentralized Exchange (Bitone DEX), which automates the decentralized exchange of tokens between users and interoperability operations between chains.  It is about offering the world a level of financial integration that has never existed before.  https://i.imgur.com/H8ACo9v.png?1   PARTICIPATE IN THE PRESALE!  Token: Bitone node Presale price: 400 dollars in ether = 1 bitone node Minimun capital: 100 dollars in ether Platform: Ethereum ERC20 (first months), Bitone Blockchain (Coming soon) We accept: ETH Beginning of the sale of the token: July 31, 2018 at 00:00 GMT +2 (Madrid) End of the sale of the token: August 31, 2018 at 00:00 GMT +2 (Madrid) Tokens for sale: 50,000 bitone node    If you have any questions and want to speak directly with the team, we invite you to some to our telegram channel.  https://t.me/Bitone_Network  https://i.imgur.com/p3xGznr.png
